answers.answer: Hi.  I'm not a medical professional, just the parent of a kid with diabetes.  Your question is very medically technical, and the volunteers here don't have the expertise to be able to answer it.  I'd check with your doctor to see if they can help answer your question.

question: iI am married to a man who is 21 yrs of age and he is an IV user and he uses fentanyol patches not the jell type the other type that are flat and small 50mcg with that patch he puts 45cc of vinager and 90cc of water and boils it fore about 3 minutes then injects it into his veins.He is also a Diabetic can you please tell me what the after affects to his veins he is causing, and to his diabetieshe has got to be doing something very dangerous to his body this way,someone please please write back to me?
title: vinager
